methods.name: toggleFullscreen
methods.description: Toggle the view to be fullscreen or not fullscreen
methods.description_zh: 将视图切换为全屏或不全屏

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when the component changes the model; This event _isn't_ fired if the model is changed externally; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 当组件更改模型时发出;如果模型_isn外部更改，则t_触发此事件;也被 v-model 使用

events.name: before-transition
events.description: Emitted before transitioning to a new panel
events.description_zh: 在过渡到新面板之前发出

events.name: transition
events.description: Emitted after component transitioned to a new panel
events.description_zh: 在组件过渡到新面板后发出

events.name: update:fullscreen
events.description: Used by Vue on 'v-model:fullscreen' prop for updating its value
events.description_zh: 被 Vue 在 'v-model：fullscreen' prop 上使用，以更新其值

height.description: Height of Carousel in CSS units, including unit name
height.description_zh: 以 CSS 单位表示的轮播高度，包括单位名称
height.desc: Height of Carousel in CSS units, including unit name

padding.description: Applies a default padding to each slide, according to the usage of 'arrows' and 'navigation' props
padding.description_zh: 根据 'arrows' 和 'navigation' props 的用法，为每张幻灯片应用默认内边距

control-color.desc: Color name for text color of QCarousel button controls (arrows, navigation) from the Quasar Color Palette
control-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
control-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

control-text-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
control-text-color.desc: Color name for text color of QCarousel button controls (arrows, navigation) from the Quasar Color Palette
control-text-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

control-type.description: Type of button to use for controls (arrows, navigation)
control-type.description_zh: 用于控件的按钮类型（箭头、导航）

autoplay.description: Jump to next slide (if 'true' or val > 0) or previous slide (if val < 0) at fixed time intervals (in milliseconds); 'false' disables autoplay, 'true' enables it for 5000ms intervals
autoplay.description_zh: 以固定的时间间隔（以毫秒为单位）跳转到下一张幻灯片（如果 'true' 或 val > 0）或上一张幻灯片（如果 val < 0）;'false' 禁用自动播放，'true' 启用 5000 毫秒间隔

navigation-active-icon.description: Icon name following Quasar convention for the active (current slide) navigation icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix
navigation-active-icon.description_zh: 活动（当前幻灯片）导航图标的图标名称遵循 Quasar 约定;确保已安装图标库，除非使用 'img：' 前缀
navigation-active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention for the active (current slide) navigation icon; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

transition-prev.description: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-prev.description_zh: Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一（仅在设置了 'animated' prop 时有效）
transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-next.description: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-next.description_zh: Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一（仅在设置了 'animated' prop 时有效）
transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

v-model.description: Model of the component defining the current panel's name; If a Number is used, it does not define the panel's index, but rather the panel's name which can also be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use the v-model directive.
v-model.description_zh: 定义当前面板名称的组件的模型;如果使用 Number ，则它不会定义面板的索引，而是定义面板的名称，该名称也可以是 Integer ;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令。

keep-alive.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native <keep-alive> component on the content
keep-alive.description_zh: 相当于<keep-alive>在内容上使用 Vue 的原生组件

keep-alive-include.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native include prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-include.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 include prop <keep-alive>for ;值必须是有效的 Vue 组件名称

keep-alive-exclude.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native exclude prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-exclude.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 exclude prop <keep-alive>for ;值必须是有效的 Vue 组件名称

keep-alive-max.description: Equivalent to using Vue's native max prop for <keep-alive>
keep-alive-max.description_zh: 相当于使用 Vue 的原生 max prop for <keep-alive>

animated.description: Enable transitions between panel (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)
animated.description_zh: 启用面板之间的过渡（另见 'transition-prev' 和 'transition-next' 属性）

infinite.description: Makes component appear as infinite (when reaching last panel, next one will become the first one)
infinite.description_zh: 使组件显示为无限（当到达最后一个面板时，下一个面板将成为第一个面板）

swipeable.description: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)
swipeable.description_zh: 启用滑动事件（可能会干扰内容的触摸/鼠标事件）

vertical.description: Default transitions and swipe actions will be on the vertical axis
vertical.description_zh: 默认过渡和滑动操作将位于纵轴上

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

no-route-fullscreen-exit.description: Changing route app won't exit fullscreen
no-route-fullscreen-exit.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会全屏退出

slots.name: navigation-icon
slots.description: Slot for navigation icon/btn; Suggestion: QBtn
slots.description_zh: 导航图标/btn 插槽;建议：QBtn
